General.Name: Krafton Inc
General.Description: KRAFTON, Inc. develops, distributes, and sells mobile game and application software in Asia, Korea, the United States, Europe, and internationally. It offers PC, mobile, console, and other games. The company also provides consulting advisory and investment services; and database search, development, and sales services. In addition, it engages in the production of video contents. The company was formerly known as Bluehole Studio Inc. and changed its name to KRAFTON, Inc. in November 2018. KRAFTON, Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
